message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant at $110. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
